message.content:
1. There are forty patients undergoing major abdominal surgery.
2. The surgery is for bowel cancer.
3. The patients were divided into two groups.
4. One group is the balanced solution (BS) group.
5. The other group is the unbalanced solution (UBS) group.
6. The BS group received balanced solutions.
7. The UBS group received unbalanced solutions.
8. The solutions administered were either colloids or crystalloids.

messages.content:
Statement: Forty patients undergoing major abdominal surgery (bowel cancer) were allocated in two groups, the balanced solution (BS) group in which the fluids administered were balanced solutions (colloids and crystalloids); and the unbalanced solution (UBS) group in which the fluids administered were unbalanced solutions (colloids and crystalloids).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
